headline: Is Fortinet Fairly Priced After a Choppy Year and Modest DCF Upside?
summary: Wondering whether Fortinet is a bargain or a value trap at around $82 a share? This article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. Despite a choppy year with the share price down 13.0% year to date and 15.5% over 12 months, long term holders are still sitting on gains of 63.4% over 3 years and 171.0% over 5 years. Recently, investors have been digesting a mix of cybersecurity sector headlines, from growing enterprise security budgets to a heightened focus...

headline: Fortinet (FTNT): Reassessing Valuation After A Mixed Share Price Performance This Year
summary: Fortinet (FTNT) has been grinding through a mixed stretch, with the stock roughly flat over the past month but still down double digits this year, which raises a simple question for investors: what now? See our latest analysis for Fortinet. That mix of modest recent share price gains alongside a negative year to date share price return suggests momentum is still rebuilding, even though Fortinet’s multi year total shareholder returns remain impressive versus many software peers. If Fortinet’s...

headline: Fortinet and Arista Networks Announce Joint Secure AI Data Center Solution
summary: Joint solution combines security and low-latency networking to provide a secure AI data center blueprintSUNNYVALE, Calif., Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, today announced a Secure AI Data Center solution, built in close collaboration with leading technology partner Arista Networks, deployed at Monolithic Power Systems (MPS). headline: Fortinet vs. Cisco: Which Cybersecurity Leader Has the Edge Now?
summary: Fortinet's record margins, surging SASE billings, and AI-driven security gains put FTNT in focus against CSCO's broader but uneven growth story.
